opis: Prodaje se prekrasna villa sa bazenom koja se nalazi Vinišću, samo 250m od mora. Vinišće je staro ribarsko naselje u kojem je očuvana tradicija i duh Dalmacije. Villa je površine 570 m2 i sastoji se od 6 stanova: dva jednosobna ,dva dvosobna i dva trosobna stana. Jednosobni stanovi su površine 60m2, a sastoje se od dnevnog boravka s kuhinjom, kupaonice s wc-om, spavaće sobe s bračnim krevetom i balkona. Dvosobni stanovi su površine 70m2 i 100m2 i oba imaju dnevni dio( kuhinja, blagavaonica i dnevni boravak),kupaonice s wc-om , dvije spavaće sobe i balkona. Jedan trosobni stan je dvoetažni od 125m2, a drugi  je površine 130m2 i oba imaju terase. Svi stanovi su komplet uređeni i opremljeni. Villa ima 1600m2prekrasno uređene  okućnice koju čine vrt (1330m2),  bazen površine 60m2 i natkrivenu terasu uz bazen 35m2 te 20 parkirnih mjesta. Villa ima i pomoćne prostorije: ljetnu kuhinju sa ostavom (20 m2), praonicu i bazensku strojarnicu sa ostavom. Udaljena samo 250m od plaže, te je turistički prepoznata nekretnina koja se iznamljuje tokom sezone, ujedno i odlična poslovna prilika jer se može nastaviti dobro uhodan posao. Kuća  je već potpuno popunjena(rezervacije) za sezonu 2023. Ne propustite ovu izuzetnu priliku. A beautiful villa with a pool is for sale, located in Vinišće, only 250m from the sea. Vinišće is an old fishing village where the tradition and spirit of Dalmatia have been preserved. The villa has an area of ​​570 m2 and consists of 6 apartments: two one-bedroom, two two-bedroom and two three-bedroom apartments. One-room apartments are 60m2 in size, and consist of a living room with a kitchen, a bathroom with a toilet, a bedroom with a double bed and a balcony. Two-room apartments are 70m2 and 100m2 in size and both have a living room (kitchen, dining room and living room), bathroom with toilet, two bedrooms and a balcony. One three-room apartment is on two floors of 125m2, and the other is 130m2 and both have terraces. All apartments are fully furnished and equipped. The villa has 1,600 m2 of beautifully landscaped garden, which consists of a garden (1,330 m2), a 60 m2 swimming pool, a covered terrace next to the 35 m2 pool, and 20 parking spaces. The villa also has utility rooms: a summer kitchen with storage (20 m2), a laundry room and a pool engine room with storage. Only 250m from the beach, it is a touristic property that is rented out during the season, as well as a great business opportunity because you can continue a well-established business.
